author: knoxnews.com
title: Bulletin board: Oct. 11 - PrepXtra
text:
Basketball
Camp: Tennessee Basketball Academy camp at 1501 Kirby Road on Monday-Tuesday. 864-451-9690.
Tryouts: Tennessee Travelers winter team tryouts Oct. 20, 22, 7-8 year olds at 6 p.m., 9 and 10 year olds at 6:45, 11 and 12 year olds at 7:30. 864-451-9690
Contest: Knoxville Elks Lodge free throw competition for girls and boys ages 8-13 at 1819 Dry Gap Pike on Oct. 23 at 4:30 p.m. 865-712-8108.
Fishing
Meeting: Tennessee Striped Bass Association monthly meeting Oct. 20 at Puleo's Grill. Dinner at 6 p.m., meeting at 7. 865-223-9788.
Hockey
Pride Night: Knoxville PrideFest with the Ice Bears on Oct. 17 at 6:30 p.m. Includes dinner, ice box seating, player visits, and door prizes. $50. knoxvillepridefest.org/store/ice-bears
Clinic: Knoxville Amateur Hockey Association sled hockey clinic at Cool Sports on Friday at 6:30 p.m. For ages 5 and over with physical and cognitive disabilities. 865-207-0652 or kaha.org.
POLICY
The News Sentinel sports department publishes announcements of sports-related meetings, tournaments, speakers and the like in the Bulletin Board as a public service.
Deadline for Sunday items is noon Friday. There is no charge for Bulletin Board items. However, because of space limitations, we can publish items only once and the News Sentinel reserves the right to refuse any submission.
Bulletin Board items must be submitted in writing, either in person, by mail (2332 News Sentinel Drive, Knoxville, TN., 37921-5761) by fax (865-342-6106) or by email (sports@knoxnews.com).
